member.name: T:HurPsyLib.Experiment
member.summary: The class which represents the complete definition of a computerized psychology experiment.

member.name: F:HurPsyLib.Experiment.stimulusDict
member.summary: The Dictionary collection which helps access Stimulus objects through their ids.

member.name: F:HurPsyLib.Experiment.locatorDict
member.summary: The Dictionary collection which helps access Locator objects through their ids.

member.name: P:HurPsyLib.Experiment.Origin
member.summary: The property which helps get/set the origin choice for the experiment.

member.name: P:HurPsyLib.Experiment.FileName
member.summary: The property which helps get/set the name of the file where the experiment definition will be saved.

member.name: P:HurPsyLib.Experiment.Blocks
member.summary: The list of Block objects which represent the trial blocks that make up the experiment.

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.#ctor
member.summary: The default class constructor which starts with an empty filename and empty lists.

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.AddStimulus(HurPsyLib.Stimulus)
member.summary: The method which adds a Stimulus object to the Dictionary collection associating Stimulus objects with their ids.
member.param: Stimulus object which will be added to the Dictionary collection.
member.returns: A boolean flag indicating whether the operation was successful

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.StimulusIdExists(System.String)
member.summary: The boolean function to check whether a Stimulus with the given id already exists in the Dictionary collection.
member.param: The Stimulus id which will be checked
member.returns: A boolean flag indicating the presence of the given id

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.ReplaceStimulusId(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method which updates the id of a Stimulus object in the Dictionary collection. This method must be called when an end-user gives a Stimulus object a new id through an experimental design program. Otherwise, the Dictionary collection associating Stimulus objects with their ids will be out of date.
member.param: Previous id of the Stimulus object
New if od the Stimulus object

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.GetStimulus(System.String)
member.summary: The method which helps access a Stimulus object through its id.
member.param: The id of the Stimulus object which will be accessed.

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.GetStimuli
member.summary: The method which constructs a new generic list of Stimulus objects.
member.returns: The generic list of Stimulus objects

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.RemoveStimulus(HurPsyLib.Stimulus)
member.summary: The method which removes the Stimulus object with the given id from the Dictionary collection.
member.param: The Stimulus object to be removed

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.Experiment.AddLocator(HurPsyLib.Locator)
member.summary: The method which adds a Locator object to the Dictionary collection associating Locator objects with their ids.
member.param: Locator object which will be added to the Dictionary collection.
member.returns: A boolean flag indicating whether the operation was successful

member.name: M:HurPsyLib.HurPsyException.LibError(System.String)
member.summary: This static method provides a shortcut to throw an exception referring to a named string resource in HurPsyLibStrings assembly.
